title: Alright Mr Curator, Chips Down Right Here, RIGHT NOW
body:
Hey Jikker,

We understand that you want to get word out about community member(s) regarding their behavior but this is not the correct avenue to get visibility on them.

Here is a link to your post below:

You mean like this guy?

-Kshaway video of a guy doing poorly-

It's FRICKIN KSHAWAY!  It's a funny YouTube video!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I don't know the guy.  I'm not witch hunting.  I don't care who the heck he is.  I'm posting a darn good funny video

This is nonsense

EDIT:  We're brainstorming some propositions to put forth to the mods to help with moderation so this kind of thing can be avoided.  If you have any input, post away, but as for this actual incident I think we've discussed it enough.
